Add a simple "read more" button to your product page's description. 

One image is worth a thousand words, but one live preview's worthiness is beyond evaluation! So check this code snippet working live clicking here.

→ Live Demo ←

What you'll get

Here are all the current features:

✔️ "Read More" button uses your customized buttons' style
✔️ Only adds the button if the description has more than 250px
✔️ Super lightweight code exclusively injected at the product page, performance of website is not affected

Installation

Installation takes less than 1 minute!

You just need to copy and paste the files that come in this product into your theme.

Detailed instructions can be found here.
